user_query: My friends and I are planning a road trip and we want to find the best gas prices along the way. Can you provide us with the latest prices for Premium Diesel B7, Gasohol E20, and Gasohol 91? Additionally, we would like to know the Fear and Greed Index to stay updated on the market conditions during our trip.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest gas prices for Premium Diesel B7, Gasohol E20, and Gasohol 91 along the planned road trip route.
Retrieve the current Fear and Greed Index to provide insight into market conditions during the trip.
